Package edu.cnm.deepdive.powdr.service

Class MessageService

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cnm.deepdive.powdr.service.MessageService
  • @Service
public class MessageService
extends java.lang.Object
    Service class for Message that will hold the business logic for the entity of saving, getting one or all instances of the entity, and deleting an instance of the entity.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      MessageService​(MessageRepository messageRepository)
      Constructs an instance of MessageRepository.

      Deletes a message.

      Gets a message according to it's ID in the database.
      java.util.List<Message> getAllBySenderOrReceiver​(User sender, User receiver)
      Gets all messages by specified sender or receiver.
      Message save​(Message message)
      Get's a message between two users, if a message does not exist, then create a message between the two users.

    • Method Detail

      • save

        public Message save​(Message message)
        Get's a message between two users, if a message does not exist, then create a message between the two users.
        Parameters:
        message - Instance of Message
        Returns:
        The message between the two users, or save the message if one does not exist.

      • get

        public java.util.Optional<Message> get​(java.util.UUID id)
        Gets a message according to it's ID in the database.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Message

      • getAllBySenderOrReceiver

        public java.util.List<Message> getAllBySenderOrReceiver​(User sender,
                                                        User receiver)
        Gets all messages by specified sender or receiver.
        Parameters:
        sender - User who sent the message.
        receiver - User who receives the message.
        Returns:
        A list of messages between the two users.

      • delete

        public void delete​(Message message)
        Deletes a message.
        Parameters:
        message - Message to be deleted.
